name: Just Shapes and Bits
description:
WARNING: EPILEPSY

This is a demake of the indie game Just Shapes and Beats make by Berzerk studio. (which isn't out just yet) Their website is here and their Twitter is here

I decided that this would be an indie game music compilation, because this is my demake and I can do what I want.

Controls:

Player 1: WASD to move. Space to dash

Player 2: Arrows to move. Enter to dash

While dashing you are invincible

Music used:

Danimal Cannon and Zef: Chronos (From Just Shapes and Beats, yay recursive references!)

Chipzel: Chipped of the NecroDancer 3-2 Dance of the Decorous 

Jake Kaufman: Shovel Knight Original Soundtrack - 33 Flowers of Antimony (The Explodatorium)

if you find any bugs, please don't hesitate to contact me.

My Twitter:  @S1lv3rOff

Originally made for the music Game Jam September 2017

Updated May 29 2018
